about_text: Welcome to PendraCore — connecting communities and creativity in one place.
events_text: 🎁 Upcoming: Digital Secret Santa! Vote soon for the event date. Only digital gifts – no addresses needed!
news_text: 📢 PendraCore goes International! After an internal team meeting, we’re expanding globally. Integrated servers: Civitas, TheSphere, Diamantenschloss ✅. There will be a dedicated German channel, but the main area will stay in English.
